title: Anyone know...
content:
What this font may be? Juat the font that the words “Old Gas” are written in? [http://www.gaspumps.info/images/s-closeup.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080909074250/http:/www.gaspumps.info/images/s-closeup.jpg "http://www.gaspumps.info/images/s-closeup.jpg")

Greatly appreciate it!

 [‹ Blackletter with hatch mark fill](http://web.archive.org/web/20080909074250/http:/typophile.com/node/49188 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need help with identifying these fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080909074250/http:/typophile.com/node/49185 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tmbandefe

comments.content:
no idea but you may be able to find something like that at Letterhead Fonts...  
 [http://letterheadfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080909074250/http:/letterheadfonts.com/ "http://letterheadfonts.com/")
